trans-unit.source: Provides custom channel information that is carried along with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de canal personalizado que são executadas juntamente com o <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef.ChannelInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
It provides access to transport specific information contributed by the channels that are able to receive calls in the process or application domain where the object lives.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso a informações específicas contribuídas pelo domínio de aplicação onde o objeto exista ou canais que podem receber chamadas no processo de transporte.

trans-unit.source: This interface might also be used when building custom <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface também pode ser utilizada na criação personalizada <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: When an existing object instance is marshaled to produce a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A> is copied from the channel (see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver>) for each registered channel and stored in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância existente do objeto é empacotar as referências para produzir um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>, a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A>é copiado do canal (consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver>) para cada registado canal e armazenados na <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> is unmarshaled at its destination, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A> provided through the IChannelInfo interface can be examined and used by corresponding channels in that process or application domain to create a transport message sink that manages the communication between the proxy and the server object.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>é anular o marshalling no respectivo destino, o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A>fornecido através de IChannelInfo interface pode examinada e utilizada pelo canais correspondentes nesse domínio de aplicação ou processo para criar um receptor de transporte de mensagem que gere a comunicação entre o proxy e o objeto de servidor.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.IChannelInfo.ChannelData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the channel data for each channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define os dados de canal para cada canal.

trans-unit.source: The channel data for each channel.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de canal para cada canal.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador imediato efetua a chamada através de uma referência para a interface e não tem permissão de infraestrutura.
